items.text: chases one well outside off, gets a thick edge and it flies down to third man
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.text: full and wide, Shakib throws his hands at it but can't quite middle it, finds cover
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pitches it up again, Shakib drives on the up and gets an edge, but it rolls along between point and cover point for two
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: a more confident drive from Shakib but he finds cover again
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: punchy drive down the ground to the right of mid-off, he can't save the single though
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Last over of the Powerplay, Mujeeb's fifth
items.text: flat, short and quick towards off stump, he punches it down to long off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on off, driven just past Mujeeb's right to long off
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.text: on the pads now, flicked away this time to the leg side and Rashid has to çover some distance to go right from deep midwicket and they get two
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: pushed down the ground from off stump
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Looks like Mujeeb has been officially warned this time. He goes over the wicket now
items.text: on the pads, worked away easily to the leg side for one
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.text: bit too full on the pads and he flicks it straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mujeeb Ur Rahman to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Vishal gets a break. No such thing for Naib. Around the wicket to the left-hander
items.text: short ball with minimal room around off, chops a pull into the surface off the inside edge
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: pulled again, but this time it's bang off the middle, but Afghan runs across from long-on and slides across to prevent the boundary
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mominul Haque, 3 runs

items.text: full outside off, eases into a drive to the left of sweeper cover
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: Shahzad casually goes up for a catch, but daylight between bat and ball as he tries to cut and misses
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, tries to open the face and gets beaten
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: "With no Tamim and Rahim today, Shakib will be under pressure to play a match-winning knock. Will he feel the burden of it or will he play more responsibly? " asks Nisar
items.text: too close to cut as it straightens outside off. Beaten
items.postText: Says Isam: "Bangladesh's 33/2 in first Powerplay is only the second time this year that a side hasn't scored a four in the first 10 overs of an ODI innings."
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: stays back and tucks it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full, sliding into middle and off, drilled back off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length, just outside off, shifts back and punches to wide long-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, presses forward and drives between cover and extra cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mominul Haque, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, pushes to mid-off. Frustrated that he couldn't get it away
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length, tries to pull with no room and gets an inside edge to the back pad
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mominul Haque, no run

items.text: strays down leg, Shahzad goes up again for a catch as he collects it. They have reviewed. Was there a little feather as he tried to whip it away off the pads? There well may have been. Confirmed by Ultra Edge. Great review; off goes Mominul. Bangladesh three down
items.postText: Afghanistan have conceded zero boundaries in the first ten overs. Only the 10th time since 2013 in ODIs.
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mominul Haque, OUT

dismissal.text: Mominul Haque c †Mohammad Shahzad b Gulbadin Naib 9 (17b 0x4 0x6) SR: 52.94
